attributes.action: STOP The closures of POST OFFICES NOW and think the effect it will on peoples lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We just want the Prime Minister to listen to what the people of this country want, and that is to stop the closure of the rural towns hubs. The POST OFFICE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
